thread.title: Air Methods sets U.S. pace for satellite weather simulator training
thread.title_full: Air Methods sets U.S. pace for satellite weather simulator training

title: Air Methods sets U.S. pace for satellite weather simulator training
text:
Published By: Denver Post Business - Today 
Air Methods Corp. is setting the pace for the U.S. air ambulance industry in satellite-based weather data and simulator training for pilots....
